attributes.title: Buhyëis
attributes.review: You know, sometimes I don’t want to be happy and you can’t hold that against me. But this app? This app makes me depressed and angry and wanting to die. No one can hold it against me. Rather than fixing the atrocity that it is, I would rather you just leave me there and let me be sad. Vote for anything but trump and kanye 2020!

attributes.title: What should a piece of trash have a app
attributes.review: This app stock you and and I also saw that you have to add your phone number so do you like call you and you’re like oh hi this is Donald Trump thank you for voting for me when no one like Donald Trump and he watch you do any thing even if the app is not open so don’t get this app

attributes.title: Don’t get this app
attributes.review: The app has lots of glitches and it’s always lagging it and it’s always using my location when I turn if off so I feel like someone is stalking me but other from that the app isn’t helpful at all it was a waste of my time and maybe don’t get it

attributes.title: ABSOLUTELY AWFUL
attributes.review: do NOT download this app. my phone was working perfectly fine before downloading but as soon as i open the app there are so. many. glitches. and not just on the app. it has completely slowed down my phone to the point where i honestly think i may need a new one. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.title: No
attributes.review: This app killed my crops and my family, and I don’t even have crops NOR a family 😫😫😫😫 the utter stupidity of the racist, homophobic, sexist, xenophobic, egocentric imbecile it promotes sent me to the 4th dimension. When I came back it started to rain blood, the earth split open, and everything shattered within a 20 mile radius 😪 beware!!! Stay away!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Was driving using this app and a deer ran in front of my car and hit me causing me to go off the road into oncoming traffic. And there was a man who turned himself into a pickle that was the most funny thing I’ve seen then a girl doing a til too dance tried to break my window after hitting her bad app

attributes.title: AWFUL APP
attributes.review: Terrible, terrible, terrible!!! This app is awful, poor quality. Not to mention made by one of the worst people on the planet. Boohoo no one showed up to your rally, take it like a man and stop trying to ban the app of the generation that is smarter than you! I hope your app gets taken off the AppStore too, you deserve it Mr. President. 💕💕💕

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review:
I wish I could give this app a 1 Star. It’s absolutely horrendous. Every time I tried to get on the app it immediately kicked me off. Every. Single. Time. 
I hate it. I got it so I could keep up with our amazing president but someone from his team needs to put some serious work into this app.

attributes.title: Horrendous
attributes.review: I was scrolling through the app, out of curiosity and I accidentally clicked on a picture of Donald trump with my parrot on my shoulder and immediately as I clicked it my parrot dropped  dead. I would not recommend this app unless you want all pets, humans, creatures,organisms to drop dead of a orange disgustingly mess. Also the app isn’t diverse. 🤓🏃🏾‍♀️🏃🏾‍♀️

attributes.title: I hate this
attributes.review: When I first downloaded this the only thing that showed up was a white screen. I tried turning my phone off, deleting and re downloading but nothing. Then 5 minutes after downloading it I got 58 viruses. Over all I don’t recommend downloading this app.
